import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const FindAuthorForm=_ref=>{let{userId,onNewInteraction}=_ref;const[phrase,setPhrase]=useState('');const[author,setAuthor]=useState(null);const[isLoading,setIsLoading]=useState(false);const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setIsLoading(true);setAuthor(null);try{const response=await fetch('/api/author',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({phrase,user_id:userId})});const data=await response.json();if(!response.ok)throw new Error(data.error||'Error al encontrar el autor');setAuthor(data.author);onNewInteraction();}catch(error){console.error(error);}finally{setIsLoading(false);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Encontrar Autor"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{value:phrase,onChange:e=>setPhrase(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",disabled:isLoading,children:isLoading?'Buscando...':'Encontrar Autor'}),author&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:["Autor: ",author]})]});};export default FindAuthorForm;
